offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to section 23 of the Offences Against the Person Act 1861.
offences.offenceLegislationWelsh: Yn groes i adran 23 Deddf Troseddau Corfforol 1861.
offences.offenceTitle: Administer poison with intent to endanger life / inflict grievous bodily harm
offences.offenceTitleWelsh: Gweinyddu gwenwyn gan fwriadu peryglu bywyd / achosi niwed corfforol difrifol
offences.wording: On August/2017 at the County public house, unlawfully and maliciously wounded, John Smith
offences.wordingWelsh: Gweinyddu gwenwyn gan fwriadu peryglu bywyd / achosi niwed corfforol difrifol
